name: Productivity Suite
description: Comprehensive software packages designed to boost productivity, including word processors, spreadsheets, and presentation tools.

name: Antivirus
description: Software specifically for detecting, preventing, and removing malware and viruses.

name: IDE
description: Integrated Development Environment software that provides comprehensive facilities to programmers for software development.

name: Graphic Design
description: Software used for creating and editing visual content such as images and illustrations.

name: Video Conferencing
description: Software that enables real-time video communication and collaboration over the internet.

name: Database Management System
description: Software used to manage and interact with databases, including relational and NoSQL databases.

name: Cloud Storage
description: Services that provide online data storage accessible from anywhere via the internet.

name: Game Engine
description: Software frameworks used for developing video games, providing tools for graphics, physics, and game logic.

name: System Utility
description: Software designed to manage and tune computer hardware and software, such as disk cleanup tools and system optimizers.

name: Educational Software
description: Applications designed to facilitate learning and teaching through interactive content and tools.

name: Addon
description: Supplementary software that extends the functionality of existing programs or games.

name: Simulation
description: Software that models real-world processes or systems for analysis, training, or entertainment.

name: Video Game
description: Interactive entertainment software designed for gaming, including genres like action, strategy, and role-playing.

name: Productivity Tool
description: Specific tools aimed at enhancing productivity, such as task managers and calendar applications.
